statements: DELETE FROM galleries WHERE director = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM galleries WHERE director = 'John Smith' AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM exhibitions WHERE gallery_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'Spanish' AND art_style = 'Surrealism';
DELETE FROM artworks WHERE artist_id = 1 AND price > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM exhibitions WHERE date_start < '2022-01-01' AND gallery_id IN (SELECT gallery_id FROM art_galleries WHERE location LIKE '%New York%');
DELETE FROM artists WHERE artist_name = 'Pablo Picasso';
